name: 張玉鈍
objective:
就生產與服務系統做模擬分析，以輔助系統設計、改善、管理之決策。　　　　本課程旨在運用模擬軟體工具從事生產或服務系統之電腦模擬，將會論及有關流程與事件觀點、多種模擬軟體之使用、輸入資料分配、模擬結果分析、亂數產生器、穩態與終結模擬之實驗設計等相關課題。
The course is concerned with the modeling of production or service systems using simulation packages. The topics such as process and event view of simulation, building blocks of simulation packages, input distributions, output analysis, random number generation, steady-state and terminating simulation, experimental design of simulation etc. will be covered.
